docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, Dec. 13 After a debate of almost unparalleled bitterness, the United Nations General Assembly decided tonight to postpone placing on its agenda Arab charges that French actions in Morocco violated the United Nations Charter and the Universal Declaration on Human Rights. docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 14 (AP)-- President Truman announced today the nomination of Edward J. Sparks of New York to be Ambassador to Bolivia. The nomination was recommended by the State Department. It will be sent to the Senate for confirmation when...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 14 (AP)-- President Truman announced today the nomination of Edward J. Sparks of New York to be Ambassador to Bolivia. The nomination was recommended by the State Department. It will be sent to the Senate for confirmation when Congress reconvenes next month.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 16 (AP)--Uruguay voted today to abolish the Presidency and substitute for it a nine-man council.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 16 (AP)--Uruguay voted today to abolish the Presidency and substitute for it a nine-man council.

headline.main: PRESIDENCY ENDED IN URUGUAY BALLOT; 9-Man Council Similar to That in Switzerland Approved by Plebiscite to Run Country Total 195,772 to 166,427

docs.snippet: The biggest thing to happen in the foreign exchange market last week came after the close of trading on Friday. That was the announcement on Saturday by the Bank of England relaxing control of the dealings in pound sterling in world markets thus...
docs.lead_paragraph: The biggest thing to happen in the foreign exchange market last week came after the close of trading on Friday. That was the announcement on Saturday by the Bank of England relaxing control of the dealings in pound sterling in world markets thus permitting it to find its own level.
